mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.gd_title,t.gd_browse,te.dt_img as dt_img, te.dt_name as dt_name,te.dt_zc as dt_zc,te.dt_addr as dt_addr,t.gd_zeid from t_guandian t,t_docutor_expert te WHERE t.gd_zeid=te.id
SELECT t.id,t.gd_title,t.gd_createtime,t.gd_browse,t.gd_content,t.gd_img,t.gd_detailed from t_guandian t WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update t_master set browse=browse+1 where id=#{id}
update t_guandian set gd_browse=gd_browse+1 where id=#{id}
